Reviews.Title: “Wingate is a winner!!!”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: I Have stayed here many times and from work to vacation time, this hotel has been a winner of a place to stay. Easy access off I 35 and really comfortable beds. The breakfast is very good also.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible experience. Damage to the Wyndham brand”
Reviews.Author: Rothaus
Reviews.Content: I was booked with my family by American Airlines due to flight delays. The room that was reserved was not available and there was no flexibility by the staff to help us. I wrote to the GM Sanjay Varma but my request for refund were ignored. Great example of bad customer service that can hurt a brand. Avoid this hotel if possible.

Reviews.Title: “Just Right!”
Reviews.Author: RobGeorgia
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel for being in the same hotel chain as "The Knights Inn" Friendly staff and room priced right. I had only two issues the traffic noise (hotel is close to a major road) was unreal. I suggest a room on the third floor and toward the back of the hotel. Also the room had the smell of bug spray. Room had flat screen tv, microwave and frig. Again Nice Hotel overall!

Reviews.Title: “Good value for the price”
Reviews.Author: markichaus
Reviews.Content: The hotel was a good value for the price. The location next to a strip club wasn't the greatest, but I wasn't bothered by it at all. I got a room on the first floor behind the front desk and right next to the elevators. The room as a nice size with a king size bed as well as a sitting area. the ceiling were really high, which was nice as well. It was a bit noisy as there was a cheerleader competition in town. Lots of young girls in cheerleader costumes running around. The breakfast was good in the morning. Hot food, sausage and potatoes along with other options as well.

Reviews.Title: “Always a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: I choose to stay here when my company sends me to a hotel. I have stayed many times, and have found the staff, breakfast, and rooms to be of high quality for my needs. The breakfast is always hot with eggs, bacon, sausage, waffles, and juices. I get plenty to eat to get my day started. Very easy to get to off I-35 close to downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Next to Strip Club, not for kids!”
Reviews.Author: KERtravel
Reviews.Content: We tried to stay here when my niece was getting ready for a long hospital stay and had a lot of appointments at Children's Hospital in Dallas, which is only three miles away. However, every night we tried to swim there were either inconsiderate people smoking by the indoor pool or TOPLESS in the hot tub! Management could do little about it. It was also very loud with all the drunk truckers coming in from the strip club next door at 4-5am! Breakfast in the mornings was also x-rated with all the truckers talking and showing off their phone videos from the club the night before! DO NOT STAY HERE IF YOU HAVE KIDS!!

Reviews.Title: “Certainly not of my choosing....”
Reviews.Author: FoodieMuse
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on business. The neighborhood is not so great. (strip clubs and "cabarets" are plentiful) They are very understaffed and the phone rings for a VERY long time before it gets answered. The rooms have a chemical smelling air freshener in them. The staff tells you NOT to walk in the area. Do Yourself a favor....drive two exits farther and stay somewhere nice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: JSIerra_11
Reviews.Content: I have been traveling to Dallas for business for about 3 years now. I stay at this hotel every time I go. I also have clients who stay at this hotel as well. The staff is very helpful and friendly and the management is great! It is close to the airport and just a quick ride to downtown. I would recommend this hotel for anyone traveling or visiting Dallas!

Reviews.Title: “Great value and staff, much better than expected for the price!”
Reviews.Author: Last_Call_For
Reviews.Content: Really great for the value. So nice to have breakfast and afternoon snacks. Hallway rugs needed more attention and the bathroom floor was very slippery the first night, but fine after that. Tastefully decorated. Good choices of pillows of different firmness which is very important to me. Curtains kept out the light in the morning so I could sleep in which is a big plus. The rooms were quiet, up to date furnishings, the mattress was flattened down on one side of the bed, but firm on the other side. Staff extremely nice and helpful. Shuttle was great. Rooms had all the standard amenities in the rooms, plus microwave, and refrigerator. Free Wifi and a desk in the room. Not much near by in walking distance. I would stay again without hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Not Preferrable at all”
Reviews.Author: dolly016
Reviews.Content: I was there for 2 days. Except the breakfast and the shuttle service, I didnt like anything about the hotel. Flush in the bathroom was not working fine. Refrigerator was not working too. The air conditioner was loud and noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Service was poor, never received clean towels/linens, etc, lights too bright outside for sleep, ants in our room along with some”
Reviews.Author: ajordan003
Reviews.Content: When we arrived, our reservations that we made a month in advance had been cancelled and instead of trying to fix it they kept blaming others for the mistake. Once the issue was resolved, our credit card ended up being charged twice. One of the rooms we reserved had no hairdryer...although we called down for one in the morning, had it not been for us having another room we didn't receive the hairdryer until late in the afternoon. One of our rooms requested that they not clean then housekeeping called waking up the kids that were napping. That night we requested clean towels and washcloths and never received them. The next morning we found ants near the bed and someones used empty toiletries in our bathroom. We normally enjoy staing at this brand of hotels but will not recommend this particular one to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “business trip”
Reviews.Author: 5inthefamily79
Reviews.Content: Room was clean and comfortable. Nice desk to work at in the evenings. Good value. Breakfast was inclueded. Very nice hot food options.

Reviews.Title: “Lied about accommodations, bugs, non-working equipment, noisy, terrible staff”
Reviews.Author: patti8100
Reviews.Content: We were very dissatisfied with our stay. Prior to making the reservation online, we called to confirm if the King Suite with Jacuzzi had a separate stand alone whirlpool in the room or just a bathtub with jets. We were told it was a separate stand alone whirlpool in the room. We re-asked twice to make sure. This was our sole deciding factor on staying at this establishment over less expensive, closer, and higher quality hotels in the area. When we arrived, we found a dirty, bug-infested, dark room with just a bathtub with jets. Many of the light fixtures in the room did not function. The coffee pot outlet did not function and had to be moved to the bathroom to work. The room was noisy and had bugs. Our two keys often did not work in the door, and we had to go down to the front desk to have house-keeping let us in. The staff acted as if the was our fault and did nothing to try to remedy our situation. The check-in and out was fast, but the staff was not friendly in the least and did not crack a smile even once. Upon checkout, we were not asked how we enjoyed our stay and the attendent seemed bothered with our presence. We could have saved $50 - $100, even with choosing another room in the same hotel, but we were given false information. On top of that, the service and room was terrible.

Reviews.Title: “Bugs!”
Reviews.Author: Newlyparanoid
Reviews.Content: It was a very nice place for the price (though next to a strip club). The staff was friendly and the place SEEMED clean, but there is an obvious insect problem. The first time I went into the bathroom there was a cockroach scurrying across the floor. That's not really a dealbreaker, but in the middle of the night both myself and my brother were bitten multiple times by bugs. I'm praying that they were just flees and not bedbugs (dear god please let them not be bedbugs), but I don't have any evidence that they've followed me home yet. Still, I'll be ripping apart the sheets and doing a thorough mattress inspection of every hotel I stay at from now on. This was so disturbing.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!!!”
Reviews.Author: Neches10
Reviews.Content: My family and I were staying here because my 2 yr old son had a procedure at Children's Hospital the next morining. We get to our room I pull out the sofa bed and find the sheets all mangled and hair and dirt on the sheets. I call to go ask how a the bed is put together are the sheets just thrown in, she said yes so it will fold back up...I told her the bed looked used she said that someone goes in behind the maid to check the rooms and assures me it is fine. I call back and say I want new sheets, it takes 30 min and still no sheets.So i fold the bed up half way and while my kids are playing they find used sex toys....Well long story short we moved rooms only saw the manager once did not get any compensation for all the incovenients. Very poor service I should not have had to communicate between the front desk the manager should have stepped up. Now I have put a complain in to corporate so maybe they will do somenthing now...The room was nasty and service sucked!!

Reviews.Title: “Best little sleep house in TX!”
Reviews.Author: Pinkie87
Reviews.Content: I choose this Wingate each time I travel to Dallas. The staff is so accomdating, the rooms are clean and roomy. The breakfast buffet is open til 9:30 am for those mornings we can sleep at little later. I love that there is an INDOOR pool and hot tub so I can relax and unwind at the end of the day. Location is near enough downtown to be convient yet not in the hubbub of city. I would highly recommend this hotel for it's value, hospitality and comfort.

Reviews.Title: “Leary”
Reviews.Author: Texas_Surfer
Reviews.Content: A "Gentlemen's Club" is right next door. I was tired and needed to fly out early so I settled on this hotel. There were meth-heads in the parking lot at 2:30 a.m. I had read about the smashed window on Trip Advisor, but could not remember which hotel. At least the front desk clerk did not lie. He informed me that they often have vehicle windows broken through out the area. I would not rely on the hotel for shuttle service to catch a flight. They didn't follow through with a wake-up call. The facility is a little smokey. All the hotels seemed shady with nafarious characters off of Stemmons I35/Mockingbird/ Reagal Row area. However for the price this seemed to be a little cleaner and newer. Next time I will stay further away and probably pay more.

Reviews.Title: “great front desk staff”
Reviews.Author: ilovekiayah
Reviews.Content: Front desk staff very professional and polite....Diantha Johnson and the new trainee girl with her! Keep up the good work! Hotel nice...very updated. Could use bigger beds in the double rooms! Nice pool and hot tub...very clean. Beautiful lobby area. Rooms are good size and overall clean. Nice work area in double room.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: monica_belladucci
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay.The staff is very helpfull. Breakfast is great!

Reviews.Title: “Car broken into! Hotel lies!”
Reviews.Author: karenp729
Reviews.Content: My husband's truck was broken into in the parking lot. They did major damage to the door and demolished the dashboard to get to the radio. The hotel told us they had a security guard and a video camera on the parking lot, but I when I called the hotel manager, Sandra E. McGregor, and left her a message asking if we could see the video, she never called back! They obviously lie, and I suspect one of their own employees is involved in the thefts as I read on this site that someone had their car broken into there last October. And this hotel simply doesn't care as they can't be held legally responible...the front desk people practically snickered at us when we told them what happened. My husband has been staying there a lot for work, a loyal customer, but they didn't care. We left immediately to a safer hotel. DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL IF YOU VALUE YOUR CAR AND BELONGINGS.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for the money”
Reviews.Author: springlady
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the Wingate Inn at Market Center several times in the past and was taken aback by the bad reviews. I was pleasantly surprised. Wingate has upgraded their breakfast since the last time I stayed there in January of 2005. My room was clean, pleasantly decorated, and well appointed with a king size bed as well as a king size sofa bed, free wireless internet, a nice desk to work at, a coffee pot, refrigerator, and microwave. My only complaint was that the shuttle for market didn't have enough seating and since we were in a hurry I sprung for a cab but at my internet rate of $79 a night I could afford to! I've paid a lot more for a room during Dallas Market but the Wingate Inn was just as good as most of the other ones.

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as I expected from wingate”
Reviews.Author: m8cTexas
Reviews.Content: This hotel was not what I expected from wingate. The staff was very courteous and the location was great. We were 10 minutes from anything that we wanted to do in Dallas. But....the hotel was not as clean as I like. We booked this hotel because of the indoor pool and my 10 year old was very disappointed. The indoor pool was not heated and was really to cool to swim in. The hot tub had an opened box of bar soap, a washrag, and a towel beside it. It appeared someone had used it as a bathtub. Not appealing at all. This hotel was a good place for a business traveler, but not for a family.

Reviews.Title: “Unsafe Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hotel for one night on a Sunday night. I did not have reservations. The Hotel looked nice from the outside and the interior looked nice (new). I checked in past midnight. The clerk was not very attentive. She acted like she really didn't want me there. While I was unloading my car, a drunk male was wondering the parking lot. I told the desk clerk and she acted like she could have cared less. I parked in front of the Hotel in view of the front desk windows. The next morning I went out to my car about 9:30am to find that my passenger side window had been smashed and the trunk had been opened. Thank goodness I had taken everything out of my car except some drapery ($300) that I had bought. They stole the drapes, and even my cell phone charger. Come to find out 3 other cars had been broken into as well that night. I spoke to one of the other victims and she said the Hotel was bad and they were checking out. She said thier room had also been burglarized. I filled out an incident report with the hotel. They said someone would get in touch. They finally called me at 3:45pm to tell me that they were sorry the incident had happened and that they were not responsible. The Hotel should have provided secruity!

Reviews.Title: “Rooms need a redo”
Reviews.Author: bryang73
Reviews.Content: I was not impressed with the condition of the room I received. It seemed as though everything in the room was stained, soiled and damaged. A few of the low points: disgusting stains on the bed skirts and covers, dead bugs splatted on the wall, stained and damaged easy chair, bedside table with a broken leg, side chair that was heavily marked with ink pen (looked like a kids art project), toilet that did not flush properly and that made erratic noises, stale dank smell in the room, each bed had different color sheets, etc, etc. Wingate bills their properties as "built for business". I would be very disappointed if I was stayting here on a business trip and would probably check out and go elsewhere. I had a one night stay for a leisure trip at a cheap rate, so I stayed the night and left early the next morning. The hotel seemed to only have a handful of occupied rooms on the Sunday night I was there judging by the wide open parking lot and virtually empty public areas. One final note, this hotel is not very close to the Market Center, which is a few mile south on I-35. It is adjacent to a seedy industrial area and closer to Parkland Hospital and the Medical Center. It's also directly next to the Penthouse "Gentlemen's" Club.

Reviews.Title: “Not too shabby.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I have stayed here several times for 1 night per visit. The rooms are always clean and well above what I would expect for the price. This makes Wingate a favorite of mine. The staff is polite, but by no means exceptional. The breakfast in the morning is well below average from what I would expect. (so don't expect much) It is located right next to an upscale "gentlmen's club", so maybe not the best for the family atmosphere. All in all, I would stay in again.

HotelInfo.Name: Wingate by Wyndham Dallas / Love Field
HotelInfo.Address: 8650 North Stemmons Freeway, I-35E North - Exit 434A Empire Central, Dallas, TX 75247
